skills.name: Impact
skills.description: Unleashes a shock wave that has a 25% chance to stun and a 10% chance to taunt the enemy. This attack will deal more damage according to your Defense.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +5%

Damage +10%

Effect Rate +10%
Effect Rate +15%

skill_effect.name: Provoke
skill_effect.description: The monster is forced to only attack the monster which applied the effect

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.name: Iron Defense
skills.description: Increases Defense for 3 turns and gives you Immunity against harmful effects. Additionally your Attack Bar increases by 50%.

skill_effect.name: Immunity
skill_effect.description: Monster is immune to all negative status effects

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.
